metadata.title: CVE-2016-0832 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Setup Wizard in Android 5.1.x before LMY49H and 6.x before 2016-03-01allows physically proximate attackers to bypass the Factory ResetProtection protection mechanism and delete data via unspecified vectors,aka internal bug 25955042.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0832` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

android - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-copyright - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
android-emulator - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-images - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
ubuntu-emulator-runtime - 20160307-0742-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: android package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20160307-0742-0ubuntu3').
